duties_responsibilities.duty: Understand and design highly complex storage infrastructures for z/OS Systems without supervision.
Champion customer needs and enhance user experience related to storage performance and reliability.
Act as a technical point of contact for the zEnterprise Storage platform.
Backup and recovery of z/OS systems for business continuity and Disaster Recovery testing.
Provide technical assistance to programming and operations staffs.
Develop, test, and implement System Managed Storage's Automated Class Selection (ACS) routines for storage management policies.

Enforce storage rules and standards, monitor DASD/Tape usage, ensure data integrity, and maintain catalogues and routines of z/OS storage backup, archive, migration, restore, compression, idle space release, management reporting, and DASD conversion and/or movement.

Utilize and administer storage-related tools and software such as IBM utilities, DFSMSdfp, DFSMSdss, DFSMS, DFSMShsm, DFSMSrmm, DIF/ACC/SRS, Catalog Recovery Plus, BVIR Reporting, CA-PDSMAN, other mainframe storage related products, SMP/E, TREX.

education_certification.credential: 5+ years IT experience with recent storage hardware and software experience and zSeries Enterprise storage technologies
